paragraph_1: Hi, I'm Evan Godon, a front-end web developer from Montreal. I see myself as a life-long student and I have a high interest in learning new web technologies.
paragraph_2: Currently, I enjoy working on the front-end with the React ecosystem but I'm also comfortable using Node on the backend. Additionally, I like to dabble in web design and animations.
paragraph_3: I just recently moved to Toronto and I am seeking new opportunities in the area.
